EmailTemplate.subject: LocatorSearch 2.0 is here. It’s time for an upgrade
EmailTemplate.textOnly: LocatorSearch 2.0 is packed with new and improved features and functionality to bring your location services up to the latest industry trends and standards. Best of all – for a limited time - it’s free to upgrade! For your customers or members, LocatorSearch 2.0 provides a sleek, compelling new interface that’s easier to use, more convenient and faster. For you, it offers an extended package of benefits including: - Easier integration with apps and websites using developer-preferred REST JSON API architecture - Compatible with the latest Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.1 — easy to use for everyone - Intuitive self-service portal and reporting dashboard - Real-time location editing - Ongoing development and enhancements Click here <[[https://bankofeveryonedemo.locatorsearch.net/]]> to see a demo of the new LocatorSearch. Migration is quick, easy and totally free! Simply contact your NCR Relationship Manager to answer any questions and schedule your conversion date.
